scripts.soft-clean: node clean.js plugins && node clean.js platforms
scripts.apply:ewallet-debug: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:prepare-debug
scripts.apply:ewallet-prod: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:prepare-prod
scripts.apply:ewallet-build-debug: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:build-debug
scripts.apply:ewallet-build-release: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:build-release
scripts.apply:default-debug: node apply.js default && npm run run:prepare-debug
scripts.apply:default-prod: node apply.js default && npm run run:prepare-prod
scripts.apply:default-build-debug: node apply.js default && npm run run:build-debug
scripts.apply:default-build-release: node apply.js default && npm run run:build-release
scripts.run:prepare-debug: cd ..  && ionic cordova prepare android && ionic cordova prepare ios && cd platforms/ios && pod deintegrate && pod install && cd ../../ && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:prepare-prod: cd .. && ionic cordova prepare android --prod && ionic cordova prepare ios --prod && cd platforms/ios && pod deintegrate && pod install && cd ../../ && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:build-debug: npm run run:prepare-debug && cd ..  && ionic cordova build android && ionic cordova build ios && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:build-release: npm run run:prepare-prod && cd .. && ionic cordova build android --prod --release && ionic cordova build ios --prod --release && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:add-platforms: cd .. && ionic cordova platform add browser && ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova platform add ios && cd app_build_helper
scripts.reset:ewallet-debug: npm run clean && npm run apply:ewallet-config && npm run run:npm-install && npm run run:add-platforms && npm run run:prepare-debug && npm run apply:ewallet-debug
scripts.reset:ewallet-prod: npm run clean && npm run apply:ewallet-config && npm run run:npm-install && npm run run:add-platforms && npm run run:prepare-debug && npm run apply:ewallet-prod
scripts.reset:default-debug: npm run clean && npm run apply:default-config && npm run run:npm-install && npm run run:add-platforms && npm run run:prepare-debug && npm run apply:default-debug
scripts.reset:default-prod: npm run clean && npm run apply:default-config && npm run run:npm-install && npm run run:add-platforms && npm run run:prepare-debug && npm run apply:default-prod
